attributes.action: Investigate compulsory cross country running in uk girls schools because of two deaths in recent months
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
An inquest currently being held on a 14 year old girl. And an ll year old girl died tragically in Essex recently
  Girls often disliked exhaustive sports when I was at school Are they being treated like boys these days in schools? Is it a pretend macho/equality thing? Do the girls or the parents have a say?  Or is it down to Head teachers?
   Max Nottingham esq
